com.example.omrifit.adapters.ExerciseAdapter
public class ExerciseAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ExerciseAdapter.ExerciseViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Exercise items.
